name: @tremho/gen-logger
description: Generalized central logging support adaptable to various output sinks

scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && tap --reporter=base --color --passes --disable-coverage ./build/test/*.test.js
scripts.test-direct: npm run clean && npm run build && node build/test/MemLog.test.js
scripts.clean: npx rimraf build; npx rimraf css
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && node build/start.js
scripts.doc: npm run clean && npm run build && inchjs && cd build; tsccd ./; documentation readme --readme-file ../README.md --markdown-toc false --section API src
